sentence.text: But you must n't peek at my feet like that , poor horrible ugly deformed things . "
Sometimes my brothers and I were allowed to get out of the car with him and peek at the movie in progress while he spoke to the manager or cashier .
Indie rock is the traditional playground of scruffy teenagers approaching college age who prefer to celebrate gazing at the stars than admit to peeking at the opposite sex .
It came to her lips now , as she peeked at Ted .
Lais ran through the villa peeking into rooms as she passed .
He peeked outside the window curtains , at the children on the street .
On April 19th a Soviet sentry shot and wounded a German major who was driving away after peeking through his binoculars at a Soviet ammunition depot .
Carefully he peeked through the glass window in the door .
Dot peeked in when he was out at work .
He waited a few moments until the footsteps were directly below him and peeked over the edge .
No noise came so I peeked round the door .
Dot took a chance peek in through the crack between where the two doors met .
It peeked out from under the rim of my dad 's dressing-gown with a horrible sauciness .
But how often does a duck need to peek to be fairly sure it wo n't get caught ?
Birds can experience quiet sleep when they are peeking as well as when their eyes are closed .
